SEARCH
Package civitas.celestis.graphics.face

Class GenericFace

java.lang.Object
civitas.celestis.graphics.face.GenericFace
All Implemented Interfaces:
Face, Iterable<Vector3>
public class GenericFace extends Object implements Face

GenericFace

A class implementing the Face interface to represent a three-dimensional face.

    • centroid

      @Nonnull public Vector3 centroid()
      Description copied from interface: Face
      Calculates and returns the centroid of the face. The centroid is the average position of the vertices and is often used for various calculations involving the face.
      Specified by:
      centroid in interface Face
      Returns:
      The centroid vector.

    • normal

      @Nonnull public Vector3 normal()
      Description copied from interface: Face
      Calculates and returns the normal vector of the face. The normal vector is perpendicular to the face's surface and is used for lighting and rendering calculations.
      Specified by:
      normal in interface Face
      Returns:
      The normal vector.

    • toTuple

      @Nonnull public Tuple<Vector3> toTuple()
      Description copied from interface: Face
      Converts the face's vertices into a tuple of vertices. The tuple is often used for various algorithms and calculations involving the face's vertices.
      Specified by:
      toTuple in interface Face
      Returns:
      The tuple of vertices.

    • iterator

      @Nonnull public Iterator<Vector3> iterator()
      Description copied from interface: Face
      Returns an iterator over the vertices of the face. This allows iterating through the vertices using the enhanced for-loop and other iteration mechanisms.
      Specified by:
      iterator in interface Face
      Specified by:
      iterator in interface Iterable<Vector3>
      Returns:
